ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This course should be required for every Divinity school student because it gives the requisite background for understanding what is going on in contemporary theology.

I have and will continue to recommend this course to other students. I also recommend that other students take the course with Prof. Craigo-Snell. She's part of the reason why I recommend taking the course. She makes an already interesting area even more appealing because of her effective teaching style.If a student wants to learn how Christian thought has progressed over the years, this is definitely the course to take.
I would absolutely recommend this class. Very fun, a manageable amount of reading, and covers material that is value for anyone living in the modern western world.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course gave me a better understanding of my own faith. It was awesome!
